name: Aaron snook
coverLetter:
I'm heading down from Seattle to Baja for the winter season to kite surf. I've never trimmed before but I am reliable and hardworking. I have van which has everything I need to keep me going while working. I'm available from the 12 of October through the 15th of November. I'm 36 years old and ready to work! Thanks for your time and consideration. 
Cheers! 
-Aaron
